requirements.label: Salary
requirements.description: Salary Crediting via GIRO or Maybank Payroll
conditions: Minimum salary amount of S$4,000 per month via interbank GIRO salary credit or Maybank Payroll.

requirements.label: GIRO
requirements.description: GIRO Payment to other billing organisations
conditions: Minimum aggregate debit amount of S$500 per month.
Payments to Maybank, Etiqa Insurance Singapore and Kim Eng Securities are excluded.

requirements.label: Deposits
requirements.description: Average Daily Balance in your eligible Maybank SaveUp Account

requirements.label: Spend
requirements.description: Transact with Maybank Platinum Visa Card and/or Horizon Visa Signature Card
conditions: Spend at least S$800 in total across both Platinum Visa Card and/or Horizon Visa Signature Card.

requirements.label: Insure
conditions: Minimum premium of S$100,000 underwritten by Etiqa Insurance Pte Ltd to qualify for 12 months.

requirements.label: Invest
requirements.description: Unit Trust lump sum cash investment
conditions: Minimum lump sum cash investment with a minimum of S$50,000 or equivalent.

requirements.label: Invest
conditions: Minimum investment amount of S$50,000 or equivalent.

requirements.label: Invest
conditions: Minimum investment of nominal amount $200,000 in the respective currency offered by Maybank to qualify for 12 months.

requirements.label: Invest
conditions: Minimum S$50,000 investment (of minimum 14 days) per month to qualify.

requirements.label: Home Loan
conditions: Except Equity Loan & Overseas Property Loan.
Minimum new loan amount of S$400,000 per loan account.

requirements.label: Car Loan
conditions: Minimum new loan amount of S$50,000 per loan account.
